level.heading: Copies, printouts, and photographs of public records.
level.text: Whenever a person has the right to inspect any public record subject to the requirements of this chapter, the person shall be furnished a copy, printout, or photograph of the record for a reasonable fee.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 6-19, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 2-1701.
